extendedInfo.description: This application will play High Quality Satyamev Jayate Videos in your Android Mobile Free of Cost..!!Watch all your Favorite FULL LENGTH High Quality Satyamev Jayate Videos on your mobile for Free! DOWNLOAD NOW.!Note: This Application is for Social welfare. So that people can watch and think about serious issues of our Societies. New Videos to be added frequently, look out for frequent updates! App requires 2G/3G/WiFi connection to Watch Live Movies.Disclaimer: The content provided in this app is hosted by YouTube and is available in public domain. We do not upload any movies to YouTube. This app is just an organised way to browse and view these YouTube Videos. All Copyright are registered by Youtube and Owner of Videos.About Satyamev Jayate: Satyamev Jayate is the first show ever in the history of Indian Television to be aired simultaneously on a private channel network STAR and a national broadcaster Doordarshan. The show is also dubbed in several languages including three Indian southern languages viz., Telugu, Tamil and Malayalam, along with Marathi and Bengali. Apart from Star Plus, the show will also have simulcast on STAR World, STAR Utsav, STAR Pravah, STAR Jalsha, Asianet and STAR Vijay within the STAR Network and other channels including DD National and Eenadu TV. The show was also supposed to be dubbed into Kannada, but was however not broadcast in the language, due to a self-imposed and self-enforced ban by the Karnataka Government, which does not allow a dubbed version of any serial or movie to telecast in the state. The Kannada Film Industry, however, does approve Kannada remakes of the same.On the broadcast of the show, Aamir Khan commented, "This show is being launched on a large scale. I had to make complete use of this medium. This is a baby step in that direction."

reviews.title: Its nice
reviews.comment: I have installed the other app done by \" Satyamev Jayate, AndroNirvana\", I found that one is better than this, its because there you can see episode by episode.. but in this app all episodes are divided in many sections, it is also good as you can see chapter wise, but as more episodes are coming we may got confused by the chapters. I would request developer to show episodes thumb first and clicking on that it will take us to sections of that episodes, this way it will look more cleaner,,  Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User
